item.description:
I can drive 4 people from Newington, if interested call me at 5083803737 by 11am sunday morning.We always have a great time at this vineyard, Many will share a bottle of wine with others -- also tastings of wines are $8. Please bring food to share, If too hot we can sit inside with air conditioning...no other drinks except frozen bottles of water to keep the food chilled. A link to pictures of last vineyard meetup is attached

http://www.meetup.com/West-Hartford-FUN-BUNCH/photos/9196302/130829212/

Talk soon

Nancy
item.how_to_find_us: red noodle, we will be in shade on deck outside, there is air conditioning inside as well

group.name: The West Hartford Over 40 Fun Bunch!

item.name: Gouveia Vineyard brunch inside is air conditioned
